

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgKey, configuration_value as cfgValue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'lejcuq7vlrrbv9np2u87r7vb14'
            and expiry > '1354847519';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir from template_select where template_language in (1, 0) order by template_language DESC;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((specials_date_available <= 20121207 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121207))
                       or ((specials_date_available <= 20121207 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (specials_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121207))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121207 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121207 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((featured_date_available <= 20121207 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121207))
                       or ((featured_date_available <= 20121207 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (featured_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121207))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121207 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121207 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '0'
                       and (((sale_date_start <= 20121207 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end > 20121207))
                       or ((sale_date_start <= 20121207 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (sale_date_start = '0001-01-01' and sale_date_end > 20121207))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and (20121207 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and ((20121207 >= sale_date_end and sale_date_end != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121207 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='ADMIN_DEMO';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from admin where admin_name='demo' or admin_name='Admin';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ip_address from admin_activity_log LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                         thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                                  from currencies;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from product_types;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_tax_class_id, products_price, products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_free, product_is_call from products where products_id = '5' limit 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '5' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '5' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;

sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from specials where products_id = '5' and status='1';

sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '5';

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '5' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from specials where products_id = '5' and status='1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '8.9900' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '8.9900' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                               from languages order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                               from languages order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'lejcuq7vlrrbv9np2u87r7vb14';

sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;

                       ;

sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_PAYMENT_INSTALLED';

sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_SHIPPING_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from coupon_gv_queue where release_flag='N';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT menu_key, language_key FROM admin_menus ORDER BY sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM product_types WHERE type_handler != 'product';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ap.menu_key, ap.page_key, ap.main_page, ap.page_params, ap.language_key as page_name
          FROM admin_pages ap
          LEFT JOIN admin_menus am ON am.menu_key = ap.menu_key WHERE ap.display_on_menu = 'Y' ORDER BY am.sort_order, ap.sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                             from categories
                             where parent_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
                                from products p, products_to_categories p2c
                                where p.products_id = p2c.products_id
                                and p.products_status = 1
                                and p2c.categories_id = '2' limit 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from categories c, categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = '2'
                                and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from categories c, categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '0'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from categories c, categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '1'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from categories c, categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '3'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from categories c, categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '4'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from categories c, categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '2'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, cd.categories_description, c.categories_image,
                                         c.parent_id, c.sort_order, c.date_added, c.last_modified,
                                         c.categories_status
                                  from categories c, categories_description cd
                                  where c.parent_id = '2'
                                  and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                  and cd.language_id = '1' order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_type, p.products_id, pd.products_name, p.products_quantity,
                                       p.products_image, p.products_price, p.products_date_added,
                                       p.products_last_modified, p.products_date_available,
                                       p.products_status, p.products_model,
                                       p.products_quantity_order_min, p.products_quantity_order_units, p.products_priced_by_attribute,
                                       p.product_is_free, p.product_is_call, p.products_quantity_mixed, p.product_is_always_free_shipping,
                                       p.products_quantity_order_max, p.products_sort_order
                                from products p, products_description pd, products_to_categories p2c
                                where p.products_id = pd.products_id
                                and pd.language_id = '1'
                                and p.products_id = p2c.products_id
                                and p2c.categories_id = '2' order by p.products_sort_order, pd.products_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total  from products p, products_description pd, products_to_categories p2c                                 where p.products_id = pd.products_id                                 and pd.language_id = '1'                                 and p.products_id = p2c.products_id                                 and p2c.categories_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_type, p.products_id, pd.products_name, p.products_quantity,                                        p.products_image, p.products_price, p.products_date_added,                                        p.products_last_modified, p.products_date_available,                                        p.products_status, p.products_model,                                        p.products_quantity_order_min, p.products_quantity_order_units, p.products_priced_by_attribute,                                        p.product_is_free, p.product_is_call, p.products_quantity_mixed, p.product_is_always_free_shipping,                                        p.products_quantity_order_max, p.products_sort_order                                 from products p, products_description pd, products_to_categories p2c                                 where p.products_id = pd.products_id                                 and pd.language_id = '1'                                 and p.products_id = p2c.products_id                                 and p2c.categories_id = '2' order by p.products_sort_order, pd.products_name limit 0, 10;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select (avg(reviews_rating) / 5 * 100) as average_rating
                                 from reviews
                                 where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_tax_class_id, products_price, products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_free, product_is_call from products where products_id = '5' limit 1;

sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '5';

sidebox: 

Explain

sidebox: 

Explain

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from specials where products_id = '5' and status='1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from products where products_id = '5';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '8.9900' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '8.9900' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select SUM(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                         from (tax_rates tr
                         left join zones_to_geo_zones za
                         ON tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id
                         left join geo_zones tz ON tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id )
                         WHERE (za.zone_country_id IS NULL
                         OR za.zone_country_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_country_id = '44')
                         AND (za.zone_id IS NULL OR za.zone_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_id = '21')
                         AND tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                         GROUP BY tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from products_to_categories where products_id=5;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select pa.products_attributes_id
                           from products_attributes pa
                           where pa.products_id = '5' limit 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id='5';
